title.message: Adblock Plus - Surf the web without annoying ads!

description-s1.message: Adblock Plus is the most popular adblocker available for Firefox, Chrome, Opera, Android and Internet Explorer.

description-s2.message: Block all annoying ads all over the web: remove video ads on YouTube, block Facebook ads, get rid of pop-ups and much more.

description-s3.message: On Google Chrome, Adblock Plus is one of the fastest growing extensions ever.

description-s4.message: Our adblock for Chrome is being used by 10 million people.

subtitle.message: Surf the web without annoying ads!

feature1.message: Blocks banners, pop-ups and video ads - even on Facebook and YouTube
